mapper.select: select id, comp_id, par_id, name, code, sort_order, managing_dept_yn as managementYn from department where id = par_id and deleted_yn = 0 and enabled_yn = 1 and comp_id = #{compId};
select id, comp_id, par_id, name, code, sort_order, managing_dept_yn as managementYn from department where and deleted_yn = 0 and enabled_yn = 1 and comp_id = #{compId} and par_id = #{parId};
select id, comp_id, par_id, name, code, abbr, enabled_yn, included_yn, managing_dept_yn as managementYn, sort_order from department where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into department(comp_id, par_id, name, code, abbr, enabled_yn, included_yn, managing_dept_yn, sort_order) values (#{compId}, #{parId}, #{name}, #{code}, #{abbr}, #{enabledYn}, #{includedYn}, #{managementYn}, #{sortOrder});
